definitions.definition: a written or verbal request inviting someone to go somewhere or to do something.
the action of inviting someone to go somewhere or to do something.
examples: a club with membership by invitation only

definitions.definition: a situation or action that tempts someone to do something or makes a particular outcome likely.
examples: tactics like those of the colonel would have been an invitation to disaster
synonyms: allure; informalcome-on "an open door is an invitation to a thief"
